title: Eden Gardens
summary: Eden Gardens is a cricket ground in Kolkata, India. Established in 1864, it is the oldest[3][4][5] and second-largest cricket stadium in India after the newly built Narendra Modi Stadium and third-largest in the world after Narendra Modi Stadium and the Melbourne Cricket Ground. The stadium currently has a capacity of 68,000.[3] On 22 November 2019, the venue hosted the first ever day/night Test match in India during the second Test between India and Bangladesh.[6]
